item.title: Political Ties and Steel
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description:
Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of US Politics and Policy

In Iowa, Trump’s new voter appeal,
DeSantis’s shadow in Florida does not congeal,
Biden’s plea to Black voters, quite real,
While Japanese steel seeks a U.S. deal,
And a shutdown averted, with a budget seal.

These are the headlines that were used to create this post:
